attributes.action: The Drug Industry and the Corruption of Conventional Medicine
attributes.additional_details:
Most conventional medicine has been based on charlatan practice, working hand-in- glove with the
drug industry, in order to make maximum profits.
 Yet this corrupt system still goes on and on,,,,,,,
This has always resulted in the mass murder and
mass torture of most of the population.
Very few of the drugs on the market have been proven
safe.No research can prove that a drug does NOT cause SUB-CLINICAL disease.
 This petition calls for an end to this corrupt system.
